Name: EH005-noise disturbance PDF
Output_template:
{"lookup_validation":"0","name":"Noise complaint PDF","remove_margins":"","setPaperType":"a4","content":"
{#PDF_Top_Logo}


Report it - report a noise disturbance ({reference})

Your details
{#yourDetails/SF_Sum}
Complaint details
Do you want to make a formal complaint? . {doYouWantToMake}
@af:if({doYouWantToMake} = 'no')
If you do not want to make a formal complaint no action will be taken, and we cannot process this form.
@endaf:if
@af:if({doYouWantToMake} = 'yes')
We will not notify the person against which the complaint is made that you are the complainant. We will not discuss your complaint with any third party unless we have your consent.
@endaf:if
@af:if({doYouWantToMake} = 'yes')
How many times have you been disturbed by the noise? {whatIsTheFrequenc}
@endaf:if
@af:if({whatIsTheFrequenc} = 'One time')
Please note the council are unlikely to pursue a single occurence. For further information search 'noise'.
@endaf:if
@af:if({whatIsTheFrequenc} != 'One time')
Have you reported the noise before? {noiseBefore}
@endaf:if
@af:if({noiseBefore} = 'yes')
Date of complaint and reference number (if known) {#dateOfComplaint}
@endaf:if
Details of the disturbance
Disturbance address details
{#establismentAddress/SF_Sum}
When did the noise first occur? {whenDidTheNoiseF}
Details of the noise e.g. loud music, shouting, DIY. {detailsOfTheNoise}
How has the noise affected you? {howHasTheNoiseAf}
"}
